item.title: Fixed please lock
item.dc:creator: @sickpk sickpk
item.description:
@sickpk wrote:

[quote=“vrac defiled, post:8, topic:228084”]// Setting Welcomescreen information Calendar cal = new GregorianCalendar(); int day = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH); int month = cal.get(Calendar.MONTH); int year = cal.get(Calendar.YEAR); int calc = ((year * 10000) + (month * 100) + day); playerLastLogin = calc; playerLastConnect = ""; playerIsMember = 1; playerMessages = 0;

this is what i had and everyone was member from the beginning[/quote]
mines like this and still don’t work

//Setting Welcomescreen information
Calendar cal = new GregorianCalendar();
int day = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH);
int month = cal.get(Calendar.MONTH);
int year = cal.get(Calendar.YEAR);
int calc = ((year * 10000) + (month * 100) + day);
playerLastLogin = calc;
playerLastConnect = “”;
playerIsMember = 1;
playerMessages = 0;

Read full topic

this is what i had and everyone was member from the beginning
